enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve setting and comparing the connectionIdValue, which is a critical part of the equals method's logic.
The decodeAttributeBody method initializes the connectionIdValue, which is used in the equals method for comparison.
The getConnectionIdValue method retrieves the connectionIdValue, which is directly compared in the equals method.
The encode method generates a binary representation of the attribute, which can be used to verify the state of the object in the equals method.
